Hluhluwe-iMfolozi Park.title: Hluhluwe-iMfolozi Park
Hluhluwe-iMfolozi Park.byline: Hluhluwe–iMfolozi Park, formerly Hluhluwe/Umfolozi Park, is a park covering 960 km² of hilly terrain in Zululand, in KwaZulu-Natal province.

Hluboká nad Vltavou.title: Hluboká nad Vltavou
Hluboká nad Vltavou.byline: Hluboká nad Vltavou (known just as "Hluboká") is a town in South Bohemia region, with around 5,000 inhabitants.
